attributes.action: Urgent setup of nofly zone over Ukrainian regions bordering Moldova and the EU
attributes.additional_details: The People of Ukraine require our help more than ever and it is urgent. The Ukrainian government has requested nofly zone to protect its population from being bombed indiscriminately. Our help is urgently required. People of Ukraine are dying Now! We must protect People of Ukraine Now!
attributes.background: To debate a setting up a nofly zone over Ukrainian regions bordering Moldova, Romania, Hungary, Slovakia and Poland to allow safe management and resolution of unfolding humanitarian and refugees crisis.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
